players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Alice, you are the only suspect. Bob, please vote for her."
Bob: "I suspect Alice is mafia; Diana's claim seems suspicious."
You: "I think Bob is mafia because he is suspicious. Diana, your claim is odd. I was not involved in Charlie's death."
Bob: "Alice, your claim of Bob being mafia is unsubstantiated. Bob says you are mafia. Vote for Alice."
Diana: "Alice, I investigated you and found you are mafia. Bob, your accusation is unsubstantiated and you are the only other suspect. Vote for Alice."

Alice: "I think Bob is mafia because he is suspicious. Diana, your claim is odd. I was not involved in Charlie's death."
You: "Alice, your claim of Bob being mafia is unsubstantiated. Bob says you are mafia. Vote for Alice."
Diana: "Alice, I investigated you and found you are mafia. Bob, your accusation is unsubstantiated and you are the only other suspect. Vote for Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
